title: Strengthening System Design Practical Competencies: Analyzing MOOC Collaboration Strategies and Barriers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding MOOC fundamentals and foundational knowledge of higher education systems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more key success factors (quality assurance, innovation promotion) of the MOOC collaboration model.
Learners can analyze barriers to inter-institutional collaboration (branding concerns, faculty resistance) by referencing European and U.S. cases.
Learners can establish a collaborative project implementation plan by proposing strategic support measures.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
